string.text: Retinues mod dependencies failed to initialize properly:{newline}{newline}{DETAILS}{newline}{newline}The mod may not function correctly until the dependencies are fixed.

The Retinues mod version in this save file ({SAVE_VERSION}) does not match the current mod version ({CURRENT_VERSION}).{newline}{newline}As a safety precaution, check that everything is as it should before overwriting your save.{newline}{newline}If you notice any issues and wish to go back to the previous version, do not save and download the {SAVE_VERSION} file from Nexus Mods.

The Retinues mod version in this save file does not match the current mod version ({CURRENT_VERSION}).{newline}{newline}As a safety precaution, check that everything is as it should before overwriting your save.{newline}{newline}If you notice any issues and wish to go back to the previous version, do not save and download the version you were previously using from Nexus Mods.

The Retinues mod version in this save file has been updated to a newer version ({CURRENT_VERSION}). Your save data has been automatically migrated from {SAVE_VERSION}.{newline}{newline}As a safety precaution, check that everything is as it should before overwriting your save.{newline}{newline}If for any reason you wish to go back to the previous version, you can download the {SAVE_VERSION} file from Nexus Mods.

The Retinues mod version in this save file has been updated to a newer version ({CURRENT_VERSION}). Your save data has been automatically migrated.{newline}{newline}As a safety precaution, check that everything is as it should before overwriting your save.{newline}{newline}If for any reason you wish to go back to the previous version, download the version you were previously using from Nexus Mods.
